016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.Collection;
020import java.util.Collections;
021
022/**
023 * Molecular species level according to the 2020 update of the Liebisch shorthand
024 * nomenclature.
025 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
026 * @author Nils Hoffmann
027 * @see LipidLevel
028 */
029public class LipidMolecularSpecies extends LipidSpecies {
030
031    public LipidMolecularSpecies(Headgroup _headgroup, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
032        this(_headgroup, Collections.emptyList(), knownFunctionalGroups);
033    }
034
035    public LipidMolecularSpecies(Headgroup _headgroup, Collection<FattyAcid> _fa, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
036        super(_headgroup, _fa, knownFunctionalGroups);
037        info.setLevel(LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES);
038        for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : _fa){
039            if (fa.containsKey(fatty_acid.getName())) {
040                throw new ConstraintViolationException("FA names must be unique! FA with name " + fatty_acid.getName() + " was already added!");
041            }
042            fa.put(fatty_acid.getName(), fatty_acid);
043            faList.add(fatty_acid);
044        }
045        
046
047        // add 0:0 dummys
048        for (int i = _fa.size(); i < info.totalFa; ++i) {
049            FattyAcid fatty_acid = new FattyAcid("FA" + Integer.toString(i + 1), knownFunctionalGroups);
050            fatty_acid.position = -1;
051            info.add(fatty_acid);
052            fa.put(fatty_acid.getName(), fatty_acid);
053            faList.add(fatty_acid);
054        }
055    }
056
057    public String buildLipidSubspeciesName() {
058        return buildLipidSubspeciesName(LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL);
059    }
060
061    public String buildLipidSubspeciesName(LipidLevel level) {
062        if (level == LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL) {
063            level = LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES;
064        }
065
066        String fa_separator = (level != LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES || headGroup.getLipidCategory() == LipidCategory.SP) ? "/" : "_";
067        StringBuilder lipid_name = new StringBuilder();
068        lipid_name.append(headGroup.getLipidString(level));
069
070        String fa_headgroup_separator = (headGroup.getLipidCategory() != LipidCategory.ST) ? " " : "/";
071
072        switch (level) {
073            case COMPLETE_STRUCTURE, FULL_STRUCTURE, STRUCTURE_DEFINED, SN_POSITION -> {
074                if (faList.size() > 0) {
075                    lipid_name.append(fa_headgroup_separator);
076                    int i = 0;
077
078                    for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : faList) {
079                        if (i++ > 0) {
080                            lipid_name.append(fa_separator);
081                        }
082                        lipid_name.append(fatty_acid.toString(level));
083                    }
084                }
085            }
086            default -> {
087                boolean go_on = false;
088                for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : faList) {
089                    if (fatty_acid.numCarbon > 0) {
090                        go_on = true;
091                        break;
092                    }
093                }
094
095                if (go_on) {
096                    lipid_name.append(fa_headgroup_separator);
097                    int i = 0;
098                    for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : faList) {
099                        if (fatty_acid.numCarbon > 0) {
100                            if (i++ > 0) {
101                                lipid_name.append(fa_separator);
102                            }
103                            lipid_name.append(fatty_acid.toString(level));
104                        }
105                    }
106                }
107            }
108        }
109        return lipid_name.toString();
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public LipidLevel getLipidLevel() {
114        return LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES;
115    }
116
117    @JsonIgnore
118    @Override
119    public ElementTable getElements() {
120        ElementTable elements = headGroup.getElements();
121
122        // add elements from all fatty acyl chains
123        faList.forEach(fatty_acid -> {
124            elements.add(fatty_acid.computeAndCopyElements());
125        });
126
127        return elements;
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    public String getLipidString() {
132        return getLipidString(LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL);
133
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public String getLipidString(LipidLevel level) {
138        switch (level) {
139            case NO_LEVEL, MOLECULAR_SPECIES -> {
140                return buildLipidSubspeciesName(LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES);
141            }
142            case CATEGORY, CLASS, SPECIES -> {
143                return super.getLipidString(level);
144            }
145
146            default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("LipidMolecularSpecies does not know how to create a lipid string for level " + level.toString());
147        }
148    }
149}
